attributes.action: Make sure that the troops and their families are supported and given adequate long term medical care and financial assistance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make sure that the troops and their families are supported and given adequate long term medical care and financial assistance.  When they return  from duty after being injured, traumatised or become ill due to the effects of being in the armed forces.  It is the governments duty to take care of these troops and their families and make sure that they are not forgotten or are left in poverty because they have served their Queen and country and are no longer fit to be in the armed forces due to health reasons caused through duty.
